tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Caring (1)
comments: The best professor I have ever had. He is truly truly an amazing person and teacher. I\'ve taken three classes with him and I\'m so thankful to know him. His courses have changed my life in the best way, and I highly recommend everyone take at least one class with Brandon before they graduate! He is the definition of an amazing human!

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I took beginning hip hop. I love this class and this professor. He was amazing and definitely inspired me to get out of my comfort zone and DANCE. Let me just say this, I am not the best dancer, BUT it doesn\'t matter. He makes you feel comfortable and overall just a fun class. TAKE HIM.

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I took the intermediate dance class and it was soooo much fun! I was not actually registered but he let me come in and learnt he dance piece for fun. That\'s right, I did this for my own personal benefit! :) He\'s a great teacher and he pushes you to learn quickly. I\'m definitely taking this every quarter that I can :\')

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Caring (1)
comments: This was an excellent class! The class was very fun and was a great stress reliever. It was a good workout with the warm ups and the choreography. He makes the class really enjoyable and wants everyone to be creative. He grades based on attendance and effort.

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Great choreo, challenging enough to test your skills, but simple enough to learn quickly and add your own flair. I dont care what major you are, TAKE THIS CLASS. And hes hot, which makes it 30 times better:)

comments: He grades the class easy, but the actual choreography is challenging.The class was mainly full of women and I believe that has a lot to do with fact that he is sexy. All you have to do is try and your guarenteed an A even if you can\'t dance. His style is one of a kind and students are invited to watch him perform,must go.No book used and no hw.easy

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Caring (1)
comments: His class is fun but if you\'re looking for a bit of a challenge or creativity he kinda falls short. His moves will become a little repetitive. I would highly recommend his class for newly starting dancers.

tag_professor: Inspirational (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Took both dance 75A and B with him for Hip Hop. He\'s awesome, a good dancer, very helpful, very encouraging and a really nice guy! You can make up absences by taking his other or any other dance class for everyday you miss! Easy grade, fun class, and a great workout! :)
